=pod

=head1 NAME

DiaColloDB::Compat::v0_08::MultiMapFile - diachronic collocation db, integer-integer* multimap file, backwards-compatible (v0.08.x)

=cut

##========================================================================
## SYNOPSIS
=pod

=head1 SYNOPSIS

 ##========================================================================
 ## PRELIMINARIES
 
 use DiaColloDB::Compat::v0_08::MultiMapFile;
 
 #... stuff happens ...

=cut

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Compat::v0_08::MultiMapFile
provides a backwards-compatible
L<DiaColloDB::MultiMapFile|DiaColloDB::MultiMapFile> interface
for multimap files created by DiaColloDB E<lt>= v0.08.x.

=cut
